text: Hey, I'm a data scientist and I'm taking Julia for a ride, especially trying out Turing.jl and how it compares with PyMC3 and Stan! So far I really love the documentation and examples, though I find it always a little difficult to get into the syntax of a new language (after 10+ years of Python, 1 year of R). It does seem to have a relatively low learning curve, which is great :wink:
